description: In the dark and dank dungeon, slave brandon has been tied up for some time. There's not much for him to do but daydream. He then puts the stubborn slave in the electric chair and shoves a dildo up the boy's ass. Perhaps this is all intentional on brandon's part because he's begging for more. title: Slave Daydreaming
